amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Community college gap assistance; eligible costs.
amendatorysection.para: The eligible costs for which the committee may award community college gap assistance under the community college gap assistance program include, but are not limited to:
(4) Fees, including, but not limited to, fees for industry testing services and background check services.
